page.title: 05 LUDDINGTON E.H.S.CONT'D.
page.content: MEET THE DEMAND FOR ALL YEAR ROUND PRODUCTION OF CROPS.OTHER ONGOING INTERESTS AT THE STATION INCLUDE THE DESIGN AND TESTING OF MACHINERY ASSOCIATED WITH HORTICULTURAL TECHNIQUES,A NATIONAL BEEKEEPING UNIT WHICH PROVIDES ADVISORY AND STATUTORY SERVICES TO 37,000 BEEKEEPERS IN THE UK.STUDIES CONCERNING ORNAMENTAL TREE GROWING AND THE PROVISION OF ADVICE TO GOV.BODIES TO ENSURE THAT POLICIES AFFECTING THE PRODUCTION OF FOOD EG. CONTROL OF DISEASES AND PESTS,PUBLIC HEALTH,CARE OF THE ENVIRONMENT AND THE USE OF LAND AND RESOURCES IS BASED ON CURRENT PROFESSIONAL AND SCIENTIFIC KNOWLEDGE. THE RESULTS OF EXPERIMENTAL FINDINGS ARE MADE KNOWN THROUGH THE SCIENTIFIC LITERATURE,OPEN DAYS FOR LOCAL GROWERS AND MEETINGS WITH OTHER APPROPRIATE ADVISORY SERVICES.
